snippet: Rangers Coach John Tortorella had suggested the on-ice officials may have conspired with the league and NBC with a goal of sending the Winter Classic to overtime or a shootout.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Rangers coach John Tortorella expresses regret for his negative comments after the NHL Winter Classic; had suggested the on-ice officials may have conspired with the league and NBC with a goal of sending the Winter Classic to overtime or a shootout; other NHL results and news noted.
lead_paragraph: Rangers Coach John Tortorella had suggested the on-ice officials may have conspired with the league and NBC with a goal of sending the Winter Classic to overtime or a shootout.

headline.seo: Tortorella Apologizes for Remarks After Winter Classic
